RecordThing.Description: A circuit breaker can protect a network from over-current, tripping to protect the cabling. Breakers do not trip instantly - remember to leave headroom for your cables. You can set the trip limit during construction with a {THING:ItemScrewdriver}

A circuit breaker can protect a network from over-current, tripping to protect the cabling. Breakers do not trip instantly - remember to leave headroom for your cables. You can set the trip limit during construction with a {THING:ItemScrewdriver}

Record.Value: Turn breaker off to clear trip
